Kyiv begins new probe into alleged Russian shooting of Ukrainian PoWsUkraine has begun an investigation into the alleged shooting by Russian troops of three Ukrainian soldiers captured on the southern front line, prosecutors said on Tuesday, the second such inquiry announced since Sunday. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 19:27:58 GMT XWBVKKWIN5OMRO657X6A5ESFMY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/kyiv-begins-new-probe-into-alleged- Russian-shooting-ukrainian-pows-2024-02-20/Reuters世界欧洲
Kuwaiti 'death ship' carrying cattle causes stench in Cape TownA "death ship" carrying thousands of cattle whose foul smell caused a stink in top tourist city Cape Town is expected to continue its voyage to Iraq later on Tuesday, port officials said. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 19:13:03 GMT O22HEUAGSRK43IR73YG5K55EBU https://www.reuters.com/world/kuwaiti-death-ship-carrying-cattle-causes-stench-cape-town-2024-02-20/Reuters世界
UK sacks immigration inspector after border security reportBritain on Tuesday sacked the independent inspector tasked with monitoring its borders and immigration policy after he said hundreds of high-risk private flights were landing unchecked at a London airport. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 19:07:59 GMT 7LG5E3OEA5OFLCQH7E34KRKAM4 https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/uk-sacks-immigration-inspector-after-border-security-report-2024-02-20/Reuters世界英国
Pakistan's largest parties strike deal on coalition governmentTwo major Pakistan political parties said on Tuesday that they had reached a formal agreement to form a coalition government, ending ten days of intense negotiations after an inconclusive national election did not return a clear majority. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 19:03:51 GMT AQYPMSEAKBIWPLMPSKTP7JDOKU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/pakistans-largest-parties-strike-deal-coalition-government-says-ex-foreign-2024-02-20/Reuters世界亚太地区
DR Congo PM Lukonde tenders his resignation, presidency saysDemocratic Republic of Congo's prime minister, Jean-Michel Sama Lukonde, resigned on Tuesday, triggering the dissolution of his government, the presidency said in a statement. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 18:29:12 GMT 5AQZHJT525IJZHWUAJBUOB34LM https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/dr-congo-pm-lukonde-tenders-his-resignation-presidency-says-2024-02-20/Reuters世界非洲
Qatar says Hamas confirms receipt of medical supplies for Gaza hostagesHamas has confirmed receipt of a shipment of medicines under a deal brokered by Qatar and has begun delivering the supplies to hostages held in Gaza, Qatar's foreign ministry spokesperson said in a statement on Tuesday. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 18:28:30 GMT AOZFKHTXZNJAZFCZ6PEZLMHKS4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/qatar-says-hamas-confirms-receipt-medical-supplies-gaza-hostages-2024-02-20/Reuters世界中东
Chile reopens inquiry into Nobel laureate Pablo Neruda's 1973 deathA Chilean appeals court on Tuesday ordered the reopening of an investigation into the death of the leftist poet and Nobel laureate Pablo Neruda in 1973 soon after the military seized power in a coup. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 18:16:04 GMT YVPOM24N55JDJJ5LBMKVTCH2AA https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/chile-reopens-inquiry-into-nobel-laureate-pablo-nerudas-1973-death-2024-02-20/Reuters世界美洲
Netanyahu says Israel won't 'pay any price' for release of Gaza hostagesIsraeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and Finance Minister Bezalel Smotrich said on Tuesday that Israel would not pay any price for the return of hostages still held in Gaza amid ongoing negotiations to secure their release. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 18:14:51 GMT GF2AQ3TWPRIHJK2XWO2VAXAAYQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/netanyahu-says-israel-wont-pay-any-price-release-gaza-hostages-2024-02-20/Reuters世界中东
Colombia could restart bombing campaigns against armed groups -gov'tColombia's government could restart aerial bombing campaigns against illegal armed groups, as long as intelligence makes certain minors will not be affected, Defense Minister Ivan Velasquez said on Tuesday. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 18:01:39 GMT H4OZMVCSQZO7RI7HGMDW5P55NA https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/colombia-could-restart-bombing-campaigns-against-armed-groups-govt-2024-02-20/Reuters世界美洲
US military drone shot down near Yemen, US officials sayA U.S. military Mq-9 drone was shot down near Yemen by Iran-backed militants, two U.S. officials said on Tuesday, the second time such a shoot down has taken place in recent months during a near daily tit-for-tat between the group and U.S. forces. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 17:46:17 GMT QMPRGRUP4RNLDNSCPXF7NC6G4Q https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/us-military-drone-shot-down-near-yemen-us-officials-say-2024-02-20/Reuters世界中东
Mexico talks with Canada about high number of asylum requestsMexican President Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador said on Tuesday that his government is addressing a complaint from Canada over the high number of asylum requests from Mexicans. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 17:37:06 GMT NP3EWXUI4RP4BKQ32OPR布尔哈https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/mexico-talks-with-canada-about-high-number-asylum-requests-2024-02-20/Reuters世界美洲
